co.cask.coopr.scheduler

Class ServiceDependencyResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.coopr.scheduler.ServiceDependencyResolver

  • public class ServiceDependencyResolver
extends Object
    This dependency resolver takes services placed on a cluster, some ClusterAction that needs to be performed, and determines for a given ProvisionerAction to be performed on a Service, what other actions need to be performed on what services before the given action can be performed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServiceDependencyResolver(Actions actions, Map<String,Service> clusterServices) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<ActionOnService> getDirectDependentActions(String service, ProvisionerAction action)
      Given a service and action, return a set of ActionOnService describing what other actions on services must be performed before the given service and action can be performed.
      boolean runtimeDependsOn(String service1, String service2)
      Returns whether or not service1 depends on service2 in some way for runtime actions, either directly or indirectly.

    • Method Detail

      • getDirectDependentActions

        public Set<ActionOnService> getDirectDependentActions(String service,
                                             ProvisionerAction action)
        Given a service and action, return a set of ActionOnService describing what other actions on services must be performed before the given service and action can be performed.
        Parameters:
        service - Service to check.
        action - Action to check.
        Returns:
        Set of actions on services that must be performed before the input can be performed.

      • runtimeDependsOn

        public boolean runtimeDependsOn(String service1,
                       String service2)
        Returns whether or not service1 depends on service2 in some way for runtime actions, either directly or indirectly.
        Parameters:
        service1 - Service to check dependency for.
        service2 - Service to check dependency on.
        Returns:
        True if service 1 depends on service 2 directly or indirectly, false if not.
